MedicationTherapyStmtReview.name: MedicationTherapyStmtReview
MedicationTherapyStmtReview.description: Represents a junction object between the Medication Therapy Review and Medication Statement objects.

Comment.description: Additional information about the medication therapy review related to the medication statement.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MedicationStatementId.description: The medication statement associated with the medication therapy statement review.

MedicationTherapyReviewId.description: The medication therapy review associated with the medication therapy statement review.

Name.description: The name of the medication therapy statement review.

SourceSysModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

Status.description: The status of the medication therapy statement review.
